Title: Blood sample DNA from sepsis patient 1
Disease_State_Description: Septic patient hospitalized for an infection
Protocol: Bisulphite converted DNA was amplified, fragmented and hybridized to human Infinium MethylationEPIC v2.0 Beadchio arrays (Illumina) using standard Illumina Protocol.
